name: UpdateLogBasedMetric
description:
Update a specific log-based metric in your organization.

Call this tool to update a particular log-based metric within your organization using Datadog's API. Ideal for modifying metrics configurations to refine log analysis and monitoring.

parameters.name: log_metric_name
parameters.description: The name of the log-based metric to be updated. It specifies which metric to modify in your organization.

value_schema.description: The name of the log-based metric.

parameters.name: new_log_metric_definition
parameters.description: JSON object detailing the updated properties of the log-based metric. It includes attributes for computation rules, filters, and group-by settings.

include_percentiles.description:
Toggle to include or exclude percentile aggregations for distribution metrics.
Only present when the `aggregation_type` is `distribution`.

compute.description: The compute rule to compute the log-based metric.

query.description: The search query - following the log search syntax.

filter.description: The log-based metric filter. Logs matching this filter will be aggregated in this metric.

path.description: The path to the value the log-based metric will be aggregated over.

tag_name.description: Eventual name of the tag that gets created. By default, the path attribute is used as the tag name.

group_by.description: The rules for the group by.

attributes.description: The log-based metric properties that will be updated.

type.description: The type of the resource. The value should always be logs_metrics.

value_schema.description: New definition of the log-based metric.
